short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send PDF documents from your favourite web applications to Spindle Document Distribution with just one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Spindle Document Distribution Chrome Extension allows users of Spindle Document Distribution or Spindle Document Management to send any PDF in a browser directly to the Spindle Pro or Spindle Pro Auto printer. This is a much faster and hassle free way to send a PDF report to clients and customers as well as archive it internally.
